name: azure-devops-efcore-script-task
description: A task that utilizes the command line to run EF Core Migration Scripting cmd.exe on Windows and bash on macOS and Linux.
author: IowaComputerGurus, Inc.

inputs.name: contextProjectDirectory
inputs.label: DB Context Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the project containing the DB Context.  Exaample: $(Build.SourcesDirectory)\Source\MyProject.Data

inputs.name: startupProjectDirectory
inputs.label: Startup Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the startup project, if different than the DB Context.  Leave blank if startup package is the same

inputs.name: scriptTargetLocation
inputs.label: Target Script Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path and filename for the script to be created.  Typically the fault is acceptabe.  Remember to publish the artifact after creation.

inputs.name: createAsIdempotent
inputs.label: Create As Idempotent Script
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will create a script that can be executed regardless of the DB status

messages.JS_Stderr: Bash wrote one or more lines to the standard error stream.
messages.PS_UnableToDetermineExitCode: Unexpected exception. Unable to determine the exit code from cmd.exe.
messages.PatchingIdempotent: Patching generated script to workaround bug #12911
